verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give us vision of the beauty of the Lord, Give us vision of the beauty of the Lord, Holy Spirit, open up our eyes, To behold the beauty of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give us vision of the Lord upon His throne, Give us vision of the Lord upon His throne. Holy Spirit, open up our eyes, To behold the beauty of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give us vision of our lives as royal priests, Give us vision of our lives as royal priests, Holy Spirit, open up our eyes, To behold the beauty of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give us vision of His longing for a bride, Give us vision of His longing for a bride, Holy Spirit, open up our eyes, To behold the beauty of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give us vision of the glory of the Lord, Give us vision of the glory of the Lord, Holy Spirit, open up our eyes, To behold the beauty of the Lord.{/lang-eng}
